item.title: Understanding Correlation
item.description: Load data: df <- read.csv("../../../static/files/selfie-data.csv") Plotting Scatter plot ggplot(df, aes(x=height, y=weight)) + geom_point() + xlab("Height (in cm)") + ylab("Weight (in kg)") The problem is that people might round their weight and height off.
